Address.label: Address
Address.value: 550 BURRARD STREET,SUITE 2900, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6C 0A3, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Aris Mining is a Canadian mining company listed on the TSX under the symbol 'ARIS' and the NYSE-A under the symbol 'ARMN'. Aris Mining (formerly known as Aris Gold) is led by an executive team with a demonstrated track record of creating value through building globally relevant gold mining companies. Aris Mining operates the Segovia and Marmato mines in Colombia, which together produced over 226,000 ounces of gold in 2023.
